resources.string: "Get as many points as possible in the least number of clicks "

- Press the pink button that says Click to get points.

 	- Spend your points on buying upgrades to earn more and more points.

 	- The more the upgrade costs, the more the adder will increase .

 	- Each upgrade has a level  and a prize , The higher the level, the higher the price and the reward. 

 	- There are 10 adder upgrades , ordered from least to greatest. Located above the Clic button, with metal names.

 	- In the Upgrades section there are two improvements called AutoClicker which will click on you, so you can earn more points.

- How do I save the game? 
		 The game has auto-save. 

 - Can I restart the game?
		 Go to "Settings / Restart game"
Pulsa el botón para cambiar entre tema oscuro y claro
Pulsa el botón para reiniciar la partida, ten en cuenta de que es una acción irreversible
